site_name: Land at Bow East Goods YardPudding Mill LaneStratfordE15
description: Formal Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and County Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (England and Wales) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of a hybrid planning application for the construction and operation of a rail-fed concrete batching plant, weighbridge, aggregate and spoil storage areas, welfare facilities, landscaping, parking, access improvement works at Marshgate Lane and ancillary operations and an outline planning application with all matters reserved for a proposed workspace building fronting Marshgate Lane.
